Package application

Class Visualizer

java.lang.Object
application.Visualizer
public class Visualizer
extends java.lang.Object
A class responsible for the plots of the application.
Author:
Othonas Gkavardinas

      Plots a line chart of a timeSeries.

      Returns:
      A LineChart created by the given timeSeries.

    • plot

      public static javafx.scene.chart.LineChart<java.lang.Number,​java.lang.Number> plot​(com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries timeSeries, java.lang.String title)
      Plots a line chart of a timeSeries with a specific title.

      title - A String that represents the title of the chart.
      Returns:
      A LineChart created by the given timeSeries.

    • plotWithForecast

      public static javafx.scene.chart.LineChart<java.lang.Number,​java.lang.Number> plotWithForecast​(com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries[] timeSeriesList, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String legendLabel)
      Plots a timeSeries with the points, the upper and lower bounds of a forecast.
      Parameters:
      timeSeriesList - A TimeSeries array that contains the timeSeries and the upper and lower bounds of a forecast.
      title - A String that represents the title of the chart.
      legendLabel - A String that represents the label of the legend of the chart.
      Returns:
      A LineChart that represents the given timeSeries along with its forecast.

    • plotUnmodeledAndModeled

      public static javafx.scene.chart.LineChart<java.lang.Number,​java.lang.Number> plotUnmodeledAndModeled​(com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries trainingSet, com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries modeled, java.lang.String title)
      Plots the modeled data of an ARIMA model along with unmodeled data.
      Parameters:
      trainingSet - A TimeSeries that represents the unmodeled data.
      modeled - A TimeSeries that represents the modeled data.
      title - A String that represents the title of the chart.
      Returns:
      A LineChart that contains modeled and umodeled data.

    • plotAcf

      public static javafx.scene.Parent plotAcf​(com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries timeSeries, int k, java.lang.String title)
      Plots the ACF of a timeSeries.
      Parameters:
      timeSeries - A TimeSeries, that is used to create the ACF plot.
      k - An int that represents the maximum lag value of the ACF plot.
      title - A String that represents the title of the plot.
      Returns:
      A Parent that contains a custom chart, that represents the ACF of the given timeSeries.

    • plotPacf

      public static javafx.scene.Parent plotPacf​(com.github.signaflo.timeseries.TimeSeries timeSeries, int k, java.lang.String title)
      Plots the PACF of a timeSeries.
      Parameters:
      timeSeries - A TimeSeries, that is used to create the PACF plot.
      k - An int that represents the maximum lag value of the PACF plot.
      title - A String that represents the title of the plot.
      Returns:
      A Parent that contains a custom chart, that represents the PACF of the given timeSeries.
